title: The Inaugural Sungrow GRES 2024 Summit: Charting the Course for the Worldwide Zero-Carbon Transition
summary: Sungrow, a global leader in solar inverters and energy storage systems, showcased its commitment to renewable energy innovation at the GRES 2024 summit. The company highlighted its new PowerTitan liquid-cooled energy storage system, which passed a fire resistance test and demonstrated superior safety compared to traditional systems. Sungrow also emphasized its focus on distributed solar and storage systems, showcasing how these technologies can contribute to a more sustainable future.
likely_naics_codes: ['333415 - Electrical Equipment Manufacturing', '325191 - Electric and Electronic Equipment Manufacturing (except Machinery)', '482210 - Electric Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution', '423820 - Electrical Apparatus and Equipment Merchant Wholesalers']
greenwashing: The article does not present any evidence of greenwashing, instead it showcases the product's safety and environmental benefits.
